physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is a single set of railroad that is visible in the image. The railroad proceeds in a straight line. The components of the railroad
 such as the ballast
 beams
 and clips
 are also visible in the image. At the top left hand corner of the photograph
 the sky can be seen.

sgcool_label_text:\This image is part of the \\Tracking Memories\\ collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is a single set of railroad that is visible in the image. The railroad proceeds in a straight line. The components of the railroad, such as the ballast, beams, and clips, are also visible in the image. At the top left hand corner of the photograph, the sky can be seen.
